name: Pensioenfederatie (Federation of the Dutch Pension Funds)
membership: The Federation of the Dutch Pension Funds at European level is a member of the AEIP (European Association of Paritarian Institutions of Social Protection) and of PensionsEurope.
memberOrga:
Please find a list of all of our members here:
https://www.pensioenfederatie.nl/over-ons/pensioenfondsen
goal:
On behalf of about 220 pension funds, the Federation of the Dutch Pension Funds promotes the pension interests of 5.3 million participants, 3 million pensioners and 9.1 million early leavers.

About 80% of the total number of Dutch employees is participant of a pension fund which is associated with the Federation of the Dutch Pension Funds.

The Federation of the Dutch Pension Funds started in 2010 as a cooperation between the umbrella organizations for industry-wide (VB), liberal (UvB) and company (OPF) pension funds. On December 19th 2013, VB, UvB and OPF decided to merge into the Federation of Dutch Pension Funds.
interests: Competition, Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Taxation
euInitiatives:
1. DIRECTIVE (EU) 2016/2341 OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL
of 14 December 2016
on the activities and supervision of institutions for occupational retirement provision (IORPs)
(recast)
2. Capital Markets Union;
3. Proposal for a Council Directive implementing enhanced cooperation in the area of financial transaction tax COM(2013)71;
4. Regulation (EU) No 648/2012 (EMIR).
5. Personal Pensions
6. CRR
